content.rendered:
Secluded Accommodation Retreat

CURRENTLY AVAILABLE

$945,000 (+vat if any)

register interest

Property Information

Discover a captivating accommodation retreat comprising three cottages and a main house, nestled along the scenic eastern sunrise side of Rarotonga amidst breathtaking mountain scenery.

This picturesque retreat is situated on a generous 2,358sqm section with a commercial lease extending until 2079 and is conveniently located just 4kms from Avarua CBD and approximately 5kms from the renowned Muri Beach. 

Currently rented on the long-term let market, the three self-contained cottages provide a blend of comfortable indoor/outdoor living, well-equipped kitchenettes, and bathrooms with showers.  Two cottages have recently undergone refreshing renovations, each offering a serene haven in a small village setting surrounded by lush tropical landscapes.  

The main house, serving as a private owner’s residence, has been fully renovated to feature a modern, well-appointed kitchen, spacious open-plan living with seamless indoor/outdoor flow onto a veranda overlooking the mountains, 2 double bedrooms, each with its own ensuite bathroom, and a home office. Relax on the veranda, wake up to breathtaking mountain vistas and immerse yourself in the lush natural scenery. 

Ample vacant land is available for the development of additional cottages and a pool area, presenting an opportunity for further expansion.

Uncover your perfect retreat and investment opportunity – a relaxing lifestyle with income potential from both long-term and short-term letting arrangements.

  • Accommodation retreat of 3 cottages plus main house
  • Generous 2,358section with commercial lease until 2079
  • Conveniently situated 4kms from Avarua CBD and 5kms from Muri Beach
  • Currently rented on the long-term market
  • Three self-contained cottages with indoor/outdoor living
  • Main house fully-renovated with 2-bedrooms, 2-bathrooms, modern amenities and stunning views
  • 2 large garden sheds and workshop for additional storage and workspace
  • Ample vacant land available for additional cottage and pool development
  • Ideal turn-key investment for relaxing lifestyle with income
Register interest

Register your interest

Get in touch at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate for further details!

  • enquire@jefftikitaurealestate.com
  • +682 53659
  • Main Road, Avarua Rarotonga, Cook Islands
